mapper.insert: insert into comments(comment_number, teacher_number, notice_no, write_date) values ((SELECT nvl(max(COMMENT_NUMBER), 0) + 1 FROM COMMENTS) , #{teacher_number}, 3, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'));

insert into comments(comment_number, student_number, notice_no, write_date) values ((SELECT nvl(max(COMMENT_NUMBER), 0) + 1 FROM COMMENTS) , #{student_number}, 3, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'));
